Gareth Taylor More Tweaks !!! Digital Designer

About me

I am a Digital Designer based in Adelaide, Australia.

Over the past few years

I have developed my digital media skills and capabilities around the integration of progressive technologies.

I also have substantial involvement in analysing and using ICT systems, spreadsheets and workflow tools to facilitate production.

Currently

I am engaged in developing full stack software architecture skills using the Node.js development platform and functional reactive programming techniques to build scalable isomorphic applications.

I am also writing articles on digital design methods.
